body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       In general, permits are required for activities that may inhibit the use of the park by others, that may damage or remove artifacts, for research, or for groups larger than 25 people. There are areas set aside specifically on NPS managed lands (Coldwater Spring) for first amendment expression. See the Superintendent's Compendium 36 CFR §1.6 –Activities that Require a Permit.
title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Permits & Reservations
